data.caption: Annual General Meeting
data.news_body: The Board of Directors in the meeting held today viz. August 14 2025 has decided to convene the 31st Annual General Meeting of the Company on September 22 2025. The period of Book Closure shall commence on September 17 2025 till September 22 2025 (both days inclusive) for the purpose of payment of dividend for the financial year 2024-25 as recommended by Board of Directors and if recommended by the Shareholders at the ensuing AGM and for the purpose of e-voting at the AGM. The cut-off period for both the purposes as mentioned above shall be September 16 2025.

data.caption: Supply Agreement For Bulk Bitumen- VG 30 And VG 40 With Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (A Government Of India Enterprise)
data.news_body: The Company has entered into Supply Agreement for Bulk Bitumen- VG 30 & VG 40 with Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited (A Government of India Enterprise) for the supply of Bulk Bitumen- VG 30 & VG 40 confirming to IS 73-2013 from Companys Haldia Karwar Mangalore and Taloja Units as per the requirements of BPCL. Tenure of the Agreement- Initial Order Period for the Agreement is for One Year and which is extendable for a further period of one year at the discretion of BPCL. Quantity of Bitumen to be supplied is VG 30- 45000 MT & for VG 40 is 30000 MT and the Total Deliverable Value is Approx. Rs. 303 Crores as per the Terms and Conditions of the Tender.

data.descriptor: Resignation of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.news_body:
The company has accepted the resignation of Ms. Dipali Pitale from the post of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of 
Agarwal Industrial Corporation Limited.

 The Company has accepted her resignation from the above post from the closing office hours of 20th February 2025. 

It is further submitted that Ms. Dipali Pitale has resigned citing her personal reasons.

data.descriptor: Resignation of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Resignation of Company Secretary / Compliance Officer
data.news_body: This is for your kind information and records that Ms. Dipali Pitale the Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of company has submitted her resignation through the mail dated February 12 2025 thereby tendering her resignation from the post of Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of M/S Agarwal Industrial Corporation Limited and also from the position of Company Secretary of AICL Finance Private Limited a Wholly Owned Subsidiary of the Company. This is to further submit that the Boards of Directors of the company and its Wholly Owned Subsidiary as mentioned above are yet to accept her resignation from the respective positions.

data.news_body: Board of Directors considered and approved Financial Result for Quarter ended 31st December 2024 in todays meeting dated  13th February 2025.

data.caption: Outcome And Financial Result Of Quarter Ended 31St December 2024
data.news_body: Board of Directors considered and approved Financial Result for Quarter ended 31st December 2024 in todays meeting dated  13th February 2025.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 13 2025
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. February 13 2025 has inter-alia:

1. Considered and approved Unaudited Standalone & Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine months ended December 31 2024 in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 as amended.

The above results were also reviewed and approved by the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company. Copy of the aforesaid Unaudited Financial Results along with Auditors Limited Review Report is attached herewith.
2. The Board also considered approved and took on record other Items of the Agenda of the aforesaid Board Meeting.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Intimation Of Board Meeting Under Regulation 29(1) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.
data.news_body:
AGARWAL INDUSTRIAL CORPORATION LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 13/02/2025 inter alia to consider and approve Pursuant to Regulation 29(1) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 this is to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors will be held on Thursday February 13 2025 to consider and approve inter alia the following business:

1. To consider and approve Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter ended December 31 2024 in accordance with Regulation 33 of the said Regulations.

2. All other matters as per Agenda of the Board Meeting and any other matter as the Board may pursue and decide during the course of meeting with the permission of the Chairman.

data.news_body: We are pleased to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. August 07, 2024, has inter-alia:1. Considered and approved Unaudited Standalone & Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results along with Limited Review Report of the Company for the Quarter ended June 30, 2024 in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended.The above results were also reviewed and approved by the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company. 2. data.news_body: In the Meeting of the Board the Board has approved:1. Financial Results for Quarter and Year ended 31st March 20242.Audited Financial Statement for Year end 31st March 20243.Dividend at Rs. 3 per Equity Share4.Other items of Agenda

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for OUTCOME OF BOARD MEETING DATED 27TH MAY 2024 WITH FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR QURTER AND YEAR ENDED 31ST MARCH 2024
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors have considered and approved unanimously, the following matters:

i. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2024, which were reviewed by Audit Committee, in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

ii. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements) of the Company for the year ended March 31, 2024.

iii. Recommended a dividend of Rs. 3/- per Equity Share of the face value of Rs.10/- each fully paid up for the financial year 2023-24, subject to the approval/declaration by the members of the Company, in accordance with all related regulatory provisions in this regard.

iv. The Board members also considered and approved other items of the Agenda in detail.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter And Year Ended 31St March 2023
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform you that in the Meeting of Board of Directors of Agarwal Industrial Corporation Limited held today i.e. May 23, 2023 at the Registered Office of the Company, the Board of Directors, inter alia, have considered and approved unanimously, the following matters:

i. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) (IND AS Compliant) of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023, which were reviewed by Audit Committee, in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

ii. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements) of the Company for the year ended March 31, 2023 (IND AS Compliant).

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of Directors Of Agarwal Industrial Corporation Limited Held Today I.E. Tuesday 23Th May, 2023
data.news_body:
Board of Directors, inter alia, have considered and approved unanimously, the following matters:

i. Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) (IND AS Compliant) of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2023, which were reviewed by Audit Committee, in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

ii. Considered and approved the Audited Financial Statements (Standalone and Consolidated Financial Statements) of the Company for the year ended March 31, 2023 (IND AS Compliant).

iii. Recommended a dividend of Rs.2.50/- per Equity Share of the face value of Rs.10/- each fully paid up for the financial year 2022-23, subject to the approval/declaration by the members of the Company, in accordance with all related regulatory provisions in this regard.

iv. The Board members also considered and approved other items of the Agenda in detail.

data.caption: Results- Financial Result For Year Ended 31 March 2021
data.news_body: Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) (IND AS Compliant) of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2021, which were reviewed by Audit Committee, in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

data.caption: Outcome Of The Meeting Of Board Of D At The Registered Office Of The Company, Held, To Consider And Approve Audited Financial Results For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2021
data.news_body:
i) Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) (IND AS Compliant) of the Company for the Quarter and Year ended March 31, 2021,
(Copies of the aforesaid Financial Results along with Auditors Reports and Declaration are attached herewith).

ii) Recommended a dividend of Rs.1.80 /- per Equity Share of the face value of Rs. 10/- each fully paid up for the financial year 2020-21, subject to the approval / declaration by the members of the Company, in accordance with all related regulatory provisions in this regard.

iii) Approved allotment of 4,00,000 Equity Shares of face value of Rs. 10/- each to non-promoters upon exercise/conversion of 4,00,000 convertible warrants to equity shares at a price of Rs. 105.20/- per share

data.caption: : Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 13, 2021
data.news_body:
We are pleased to inform that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e. February 13, 2021, has inter-alia considered and approved the following:

1. Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the Quarter and Nine Months ended December 31, 2020 in accordance with Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

The results were also reviewed by the Audit Committee of the Board of Directors of the Company. Copy of the aforesaid Unaudited Financial Results along with Auditors Review Reports is attached herewith.

2. The Board also considered, approved and took on record other items of the Agenda of the aforesaid Board Meeting.
